website_summaries.verdict: An excellent pick when it comes to comfort and flexibility for water activities that only require minimum buoyancy standards.
pros: Comfortable and lightweight – doesn't feel bulky, making it ideal for mild water sports
Spacious arm openings that don't cause chafing or irritation
cons: Not recommended for wear in rough waters or unsupervised use
The pockets are on the small side, and won't hold much

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for Kayaking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over the winter in preparation for this year's kayaking season. Used the new vest on the first paddle of the season and found it to be very comfortable. I'm a 40-something year old woman and I do flat water lake paddling. Nothing too strenuous, but we're out there for several hours at a time and I wanted something comfortable. This fits the bill. I pretty much forgot I had it on, which means that I'll leave it on, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, jacket no problems while wearing this with movement
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket, no problems while wearing this with movement. It fits the same or better than some higher-priced jackets in the same shape. I purchased three others for work. I am happy with the price paid and the quality of the product when comparing it to higher-priced models. I was hesitant to purchase this as I wasn't sure it would fit the bill for our needs. Thankfully I took the chance and went with it. I will repurchase this should the need arise. The items were shipped super quick, and I cannot complain about my experience at all. Edit: 12/26/2017 Works really well, allowing for superb movement. Worth every penny of my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tom HightowerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable that I forgot I was wearing it
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for kayaking a couple of times and it's incredibly comfortable to wear while paddling and doesn't get too hot in warm weather. The Movement Torsion (MSRP $80) is the next step up from the Dynamic Movement (MSRP $65) yet when I was shopping, the price for the Torsion (size XS/S) was $6 less than the same sized Dynamic! The main differences are that the Torsion has two pockets, better material (400 denier vs 200), bubble foam on the back, and a waist belt for better fit.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Flipped my kayak, it kept me afloat.
customer_reviews.text: I like this life vest. It is high enough off your lower back so it doesn't rub on you while kayaking. I was kayaking in some pretty rough current, where I hit something underwater and causing me to flip. The Jacket helped keep me afloat while getting my overturned kayak back to shore to assess the damage. (I'm 6'1 200lbs). The little pockets in front helped keep my keys in place. Overall great fit and comfort and it does what its supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: SpiderAgainstFly

customer_reviews.title: Price went up on these.
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: The price in these has went up a lot. For this price I would instead get a NRS or Stohlquist. The are great, they fit well. I've had no problem moving around full range of motion wearing these. Bright color is great for kayaking. The whistle is nice to have if you need it. The pockets could be a little bigger but this isn't a fishing vest. I have no plans to replace this vest until it wears out. More expensive ones may have more adjustments but there hasn't been any problem with fit for my wife and I. I wear it kind of tight and after about 10 minutes of paddling you forget you have it on.
customer_reviews.author: Sheev Palpatine

customer_reviews.title: I love this PFD.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Red Kayak and wanted the Red Vest, but I only had the choice of M/L or XL/2XL. The M/L vest maximum chest size was 44" and the XL/2XL started at 44". I chose the XL/2XL, and I am so happy I ordered the larger size. I have a larger chest than most women, good or bad, depending on who you ask.....lol. The XL/2XL fits perfectly with the appropriate adjustments, and it can be worn by men, if I allow anyone to borrow it.........NOT :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: This is a coast guard approved vest!
customer_reviews.text: I have been kayaking for over 30 years. I’m not a big name brand buyer ( just to be in the in crowd) but I do want quality. I found this product well made, met coastguard standards and it fit comfortably. I’m very happy with the product and would definitely buy another one when needed. ( for those of u that have met department of natural resources on the lake and they ask for your required equipment) this vest even comes with a whistle!
customer_reviews.author: Mother Mary

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for sailing this summer. He is 5'4 and 135lbs, wears a mens medium/large t-shirts and the life jacket fits true to size. He still has some adjustment room, probablly will fit him good for the next couple years!
customer_reviews.author: christine a. ball

customer_reviews.title: Great Kayak PFD!
customer_reviews.text: With the current lockdown of businesses due to Covid-19, I needed to roll the dice on a PFD (since being able to try one on in a retail outlet is not an option). Saw all the positive reviews of this PFD and bought it - and was not disappointed! Easy on, easy off, easy adjustments, and the high clearance on the back didn't interfere with my kayak setback, and plenty of arm room. I'd buy this again and again!
customer_reviews.author: excitableboy56

customer_reviews.title: Look snazzy while practicing safety.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Went rafting and used the company vest they provide and it wasnt confortable their vest would float up on me and the arm holes were high and would have chaffed me had I not been wearing a long sleeve uv shirt. So I brought my own and this guy is nice tight fit has wider arm holes for more paddle range and its snazzy looking. Comes with a little whistle in the pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Maria G.

customer_reviews.title: works great. very comfortable pockets fit my iphone5s perfect and ...
customer_reviews.text: works great. very comfortable pockets fit my iphone5s perfect and I like the whistle it comes with. the square clip on the front is great for attaching small pocket knives. very well priced considering its competitors for this type of jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Allows for paddling comfort
customer_reviews.text: Described and reviewed by others accurately. Mesh back for paddling comfort, open under arms. Does not get caught up while paddling. Pockets are uselessly small. Read safety regulations before purchase to make sure guidelines meet your needs. I got a M/L based on reviews for a 5’ 6” average female, normal clothing size 12-14.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. C

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to. Nothing fancy but safety should be simple and functional and not fancy. Color is right on, red is the way to go for visibility. Very comfortable when kayaking, don't even realize I have it on.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Good value and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have two Onyx PFDs and may replace other older PFDs .I like the fit and comfort. The front flotation is a little bulky but there is none in the lumbar back area which is more comfortable sitting in my kayak seat. The Nylon fabric seems well made and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Turp

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of kit for the $!
customer_reviews.text: Fits me perfectly and my chest is a 44" measurement. It feels like it rides a little bit high, but I have not yet finished the many strap adjustments and I have never worn this type of vest before so taking that into consideration I am fairly confident. Will it stand the test of time-I hope so! I think the zippered pockets may not be as useful as I hoped, but again getting one without them for a few $ less seems foolish. Armholes are perfect for my Airhead Montana Kayak. Should work for other kayaks as well.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for paddle sports.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vest for kayaking and I am very happy with it. The fit is right on the money and the design is such that you can easily move around and wear this without the back hitting the seat. It comes with a plastic emergency whistle that is attached with a lanyard to one of the front pockets, which is a nice touch. The front pockets are a little small, but I don't plan on carrying much in my life vest anyhow. Overall, I am glad I chose this vest.
customer_reviews.author: Browncoats Unite!Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The price point on this is great! I didn't realize it has a small whistle in the pocket (on a tether), so that was a nice surprise.The jacket is adjustable for a perfect fit. I like the vented back. I used it for kayaking and the foam doesn't extend all the way down the back, so it made sitting much more comfortable. I wish the front pockets were a bit larger, but there is just enough room for some money and my ID.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Y

customer_reviews.title: easy to move about, nice and snug
customer_reviews.text: I bought this life vest because I was never happy wearing dirty soaked rentals from the kayak places. This vest is just my size and it stays in place. Kept my head above water all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jucelle

customer_reviews.title: Kayaking or sport use only!
customer_reviews.text: So this is a great kayaking life vest, it's definitely not meant as a floatation device for long. You need to know how to swim. If you can't or don't know how to swim then I'd get a full vest. It's meant for sport usage because your arms are free to move a lot more, it will not keep your head above water. Don't expect it for anything more than what it's rated for.
customer_reviews.author: v0rt3x

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Bought the small for my 11 year old son. Had to tighten it up all the way but it fit him very well with plenty of room to grow. He said it was very comfortable paddling and fishing. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, adjustable, great inexpensive vest for recreational or touring paddling
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, especially the back cushion that starts above the seat. It adjusts on the sides, so the M/L jacket fits a woman who wears L-XL clothing or a man who wears M-L clothing just as well (prob fits more sizes than that, but this is who I bought it for). It seems pretty well constructed and has breathable fabric. My only wish is that the pockets were bigger - neither fits a cellphone or much of anything other than id and cards/money or a compact wallet. I was out in the kayak for 8+ hours for the first time and thought it was great. Perfect for the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Y.

customer_reviews.title: just get the plain model  pokes are a joke
customer_reviews.text: as a PFD if fine but I paid a lot extra for the freeeeeeking pockets in the front and they are too small for anything but a set of keys
customer_reviews.author: Dan Tomasoski

customer_reviews.title: A very comfortable vest for paddling
customer_reviews.text: This vest is very comfortable. I use it for SUP trips that average 1.5-3.0 hours. I don't even realize I'm wearing it. With or without an undershirt, it is very comfortable. The pockets are perfect for a bandana on a hot day. I also appreciate the reflective straps as I am often out after dark on the water. I am happy recommending this product. I'm getting a new kayak and anticipate that it will be just as comfortable there.
customer_reviews.author: David Green

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my spouse. It's extremely well made and just perfect he's a thicker man. Wears XL shirts. Bought him the xl-xxl. Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Jordan

customer_reviews.title: It floats me and fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Held me up when I fell in the water. Just loosen up the side strappes before trying to zip it up or snap the waist belt.
customer_reviews.author: George Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is way more comfortable than I expected. It looks bulky, but is cut in just the right way. There are pockets and places to put items that you can easily reach. It’s also a great deal. I bought almost the same thing at REI for $75 more on sale and returned that one.
customer_reviews.author: time for fun

customer_reviews.title: Fix the pockets and 5-stars will emerge.
customer_reviews.text: Great PFD and fits extremely well. I am docking a star simply based on the size of the pockets on the front. They can, realistically, only hold an emergency whistle - that is it. Forget about slipping your phone into one of the oddly-shaped triangular pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Team Brule

customer_reviews.title: No whining, they will wear these.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4 of these in 3 different sizes. They are comfortable, adjustable, breath well, and they float. Only wish the pockets were a tad bigger, but they have pockets and others do not. Nice lifejackets that are wearable while paddling, so there are no complaints when on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Cookie

customer_reviews.title: easy movement.
customer_reviews.text: I like it . could see this would not be good for a "well endowed" woman, as there is a bit of pectoral pressure . Is as comfortable as a Stohlquist at 60% of the price. The pockets are pretty small OK for keys, or a thin flip phone. not big eough for iphone 5 with water proof case.
customer_reviews.author: Roy W. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a kayak fisherman. The cost is comfortable to wear. Has a great range of motion for rowing. Light enough to wear for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Glenn

customer_reviews.title: He can move easily while he paddles us around on our two-person kayak
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband for kayaking. He loves it. It fit him perfectly (he normally wears a medium T-shirt). He is also somewhat broad chested and this doesn't make him feel uncomfortable or cramped. It's also handy to have the pockets and he doesn't get too hot with it either (which is always a concern since he seems to run as warm as a furnace). He can move easily while he paddles us around on our two-person kayak ;)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Owen

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: The vest was perfect for kayaking. Very comfortable. I like the vent at the lower portion of the back so the padded part was above the back of the kayak seat. The vest was so comfortable, I almost forgot I was wearing it. The vest has three different areas to adjust for the proper fit, so it was very easy to get the right snugness.
customer_reviews.author: Denise D

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest for Paddlers
customer_reviews.text: The vest looks and fit great for paddling sports. Enough room for arms to move around. Have not tested the buoyancy in open waters yet but seems like it might hold well. Pros - Good Fit - Good number pockets - Whistle included and tied to the pocket - Mesh back for easy drying and air circulation - Great movement for arms and upper body. Cons - Little pricey
customer_reviews.author: Ajay

customer_reviews.title: The Wife really liked it. We have entered our 'golden age' and ...
customer_reviews.text: The Wife really liked it. We have entered our 'golden age' and enjoy sit-atop kayaks. My partner is full figured and 'chesty'. She says, vest fits nice, no boob squish and no interference with back of seat pad. This means, longer adventures for us both.
customer_reviews.author: mrgizmow

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic vest for a first-timer
customer_reviews.text: Build a kayak. Needed a vest. I did not want to spend a fortune and this one got good reviews. Worked out perfectly well and glad I did not spend more than I needed to. It is very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: David Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Solid front, must put it on like a shirt
customer_reviews.text: After trying this I decided I prefer the vest type with the split front
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice vest and very comfortable. Certainly buoyant. Pockets are small and wont hold anything larger than some papers.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Love this PFD for kayaking
customer_reviews.text: Love this PFD for kayaking. Nice pockets for keys, money. Whistle included. I like the back with the mesh at the bottom of the back so kayak seat doesn't make vest ride up. Wish it would come in some other colors but perfect otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Swishh

customer_reviews.title: MoveVent Allows Movement!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! The cut of this PFD allows easy, free movement when paddling. I use mine when kayaking and it affords easy, freedom of movement without being bulky or hot.
customer_reviews.author: S. C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: The back is comfortable when paddling unlike normal vests
customer_reviews.text: The back is comfortable when paddling unlike normal vests. The left pocket is large enough for my car keys and the loops near my shoulders are large enough to attach my camera in a camera dry pouch. I haven't had to use it to save my life yet, so I can't say how it holds up there.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Guill

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, great deal!
customer_reviews.text: These PFD's are a great value. They are the lost comfortable to wear while kayaking and are very adjustable. Better than the similar brand from Dick's that cost $20 more.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: At 6'1" I have broad shoulders and a long torso. This vest fits well when I'm paddle boarding or kayaking and doesn't ride up my back when I'm in the water like some of the others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this for my wife's birthday along with a kayak ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my wife's birthday along with a kayak. Opened the bag only to realize one of the plastic strap keepers was completely missing. There was a manufacturing mistake, the thread is in place to hold the clip that is not there. I opened this after the return date because it was a gift. Shame on me I guess
customer_reviews.author: Charlie M.

customer_reviews.title: Good PFD for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good PFD for the price. Wish the pockets were a little bigger as they barely hold anything. I have some shotblocks stuffed in one but is a tight fit. Phone or camera is not going to fit. Comfortable and very adjustable for other sizes to use if needed. I use mine for SUP and used it once for kayaking and found that I should have adjusted it a little bit more to not have it ride up but I think that would have been fixed with fine tuning.
customer_reviews.author: wilderness wanderer

customer_reviews.title: A solid kayak vest
customer_reviews.text: I love this vest. It takes a little time to get used to how high it rides, but once I'm settled into my kayak, it allows full upper movement. Great way not to spend $100+ and worth the upgrade up from the $20 vests.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: Great life vest!
customer_reviews.text: Great life vest, very adjustable. Pockets are tight but that's no surprise, whistle works well
customer_reviews.author: Brian Klatt

customer_reviews.title: Great for paddling
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and does not interfere with the kayak seat. Light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg G.

customer_reviews.title: good paddling pfd
customer_reviews.text: Good pfd..after a close call with a keeper hole I decided it was time upgrade our pfd. Fits very well and is high enough in the back for kayaking. This is a type 3, so its good for flat water and light rapids in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: 10thmountainman

customer_reviews.title: Great Kayak Life Vest
customer_reviews.text: My friend likes the jacket. It's very comfortable and you don't feel like you have a life jacket on. Keeps you cool while paddling in warm weather... only used it in 80 - 82 degree weather. Having the zippered pockets is helpful if you have a key or something small to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, allows better movement that my previous one, easy to clean and good air flow. Had not had the pleasure of capsizing my kayak to test it out but I'm sure I'll be ok if it ever comes to that.
customer_reviews.author: ivak

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Comfortable fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great for kayaking! Length in back perfect to sit in kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great vest. Allows me to kayak without getting in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great vest. Allows me to kayak without getting in the way. Im not small, so the smaller front with a higher cut doesn't force the vest up in to my face or neck. It rides high up on your chest.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: M/L fits 36D chest
customer_reviews.text: I wear a sz large top/size 12-14 suit/ bust 36D and this vest fits perfect. Like the pockets on the vest too. Just wish the pockets were a bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: Maven in Mpls MN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect paddle PFD.
customer_reviews.text: This PFD is awesome. I use it for SUP and it allows for plenty of freedom and arm movement. I took it in the water first time out and the floatation aspect was great as well. The front pockets work great for a fishing license or other small items. Comes with a whistle as well. Great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality vest
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vest to replace an older one since I've gained a little bit of weight and it fits perfect and has lots of room for movement when paddling. I highly recommend this vest for comfort and for price.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product. we purchased for kayaking and they were very comfortable I didn't need to take it off at all. Glad we made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Starrimari

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fitting vest.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect and has options for adjusting to particular body size. Could have some more hoops or attachment options but for the money this is a great vest. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, these are very nice vests. We bought Xlrg and Large. Easy on and off and aren't binding as you are using them.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Comfortable Vest
customer_reviews.text: I have resisted wearing a life jacket since my kayak is virtually tip proof and the water shallow. I purchased this vest because it was required for an event I wanted to participate in. I am amazed how comfortable it is and does not interfere with my paddling in any way. I wear it all the time now which is probably much safer.
customer_reviews.author: A. A. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and saved me in very cold water
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Wife and I spilled the canoe in 40 degr we water. Not only did these keep us afloat more easily, they helped conserve core heat.
customer_reviews.author: M D Brady

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Found for Kayaking
customer_reviews.text: Great for kayaking, comfortable, but secure. Front pockets are too small for a phone, wallet, etc. The lower back is breathable, but lacks any cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: great PFD
customer_reviews.text: So much more movement to kayak with than my older, water skiing type. Feels great, works great.
customer_reviews.author: chanski

customer_reviews.title: This has to be one of the best values for a kayaking PFD
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the best values for a kayaking PFD. Its well ventilated, relatively light weight, and while a little thick, its thick only in places where its unobtrusive when paddling and fishing. I often forget I'm wearing it because its so cool, light, and streamlined.
customer_reviews.author: Keenan Mack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great pfd for the price, good range of motion. highly recommend. just wish it had breakaway rescue attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for curvy girls.
customer_reviews.text: I am a curvy girl. I was hoping the flexible piece on the front of the vest would help to accommodate my curves. Alas, all it did was squish my front in a most uncomfortable way. I am sure for a man, or a woman less curvy the PFD would be perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife. We had some boating PFDs but they rode up around her neck. This stays low and allows for natural sitting and paddling movement. Small zippered pockets are nice for keys, cash, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Best is very comfortable with small pockets in front. We use ours for kayaking and in the hot summer they increase body temperature, but less so than bulkier vests.
customer_reviews.author: deademafmf

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for. It's designed so ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. It's designed so it doesn't ride up to your ears when sitting in a kayak, thanks to the higher back, and low profile shoulder straps.
customer_reviews.author: Jon1

customer_reviews.title: As good as more expensive ones
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it, would have liked bigger pocket at front, but knew this was what I ordered, and like it
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Zipper Broke Immediately.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it fits and it floats. The red is snazzy. But the pockets are small enough to be near useless and the zippers are cheaply made plastic. I had one break on its first use. I am rather disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: The Best Vest!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vest for paddlers! Lightweight, comfortable, allows for arm mobility. Multiple pockets for storage and overall, just a perfect kayaking vest for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: MovieFan

customer_reviews.title: One thing i really like about this vest
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, offers some aeration and comes with whistle. One thing i really like about this vest, it offers lot of maneuverability. I can now swing my arms as max as possible when I am paddling. I am a big guy and its very comfortable, nice looking vest.
customer_reviews.author: Pacemaker

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Confortable Vest
customer_reviews.text: Bought this PFD to use with my new kayak and it fits perfectly. Don’t foresee any issues with comfort or longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: The selling point was definitely the whistle.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Super comfortable, great fit. Light. Full range of motion.
customer_reviews.author: Tuc

customer_reviews.title: For yakking it's great, the only reason it's not a 5 is ...
customer_reviews.text: For yakking it's great, the only reason it's not a 5 is because there are better. Not to mention: if you go dock jumping it rides up on your back and leaves bruises.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Tankersley

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Uncumbersome
customer_reviews.text: This is THE most comfortable life vest I have ever worn. Even in hot weather it does not chafe or constrict. Since I have this I wear it much more often when I kayak than most vests. I definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Sue P.

customer_reviews.title: Recommendable to everyone
customer_reviews.text: Great value for what this vest. Found a similar one at Dicks sporting goods but was not this cheap or had the front pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: but the good part about that is
customer_reviews.text: It provides the opportunity to make adjustments such that it fits quite well. Even with the venting design, one can work up quite a sweat when paddling an SUP for any distance, but the good part about that is, it allows one to eliminate the addition of a wet suit 'vest' when out on cool, breezy days.
customer_reviews.author: t davis

customer_reviews.title: Great, wear it all day while Kayaking,
customer_reviews.text: Best Best I've used, it's comfortable while Kayaking, well made, reasonable price. I expect other vests with this design from this maker would also be good. Spend the money for the features you looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R Bush

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, performance, and fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vest and I would highly recommend this vest for paddling. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: He said that it's not cumbersome and fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband for kayaking. He said that it's not cumbersome and fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L. King

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for kayaking
customer_reviews.text: Excellent life jacket for kayaking! It has front pockets and doesn't ride up in the front. Plenty of room to move your arms. Very adjustable for fit. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ab west coast

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, but sizes run a bit larger than stated
customer_reviews.author: tuff_customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Life Vest
customer_reviews.text: I've not tried it out in the water, but love the ability to move with it, it fits great, looks good and does not restrict me whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Barefoot

customer_reviews.title: My girls will wear these.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughters for kayaking and they love them. Pockets not large enough for some smartphones but will hold some emergency supplies.
customer_reviews.author: birdbrain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kayak vest
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, light weight, and perfect for the kayak seat. Other vests rode up but not this one!
customer_reviews.author: D. Dutkofski

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for kayaking
customer_reviews.text: GREAT for kayaking. A little bit too big for me (got the small) and am 5'3, 125 lbs. but it does adjust.
customer_reviews.author: MommaLovesReviews

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact PFD, easy to stow.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of arm room for paddling. Fits sure and snug. Haven't tested in the water or in rough waters yet.
customer_reviews.author: Aaeron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for Father's Day. Perfect fit, my husband noticed it helps hold your back when you padle
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lot better then last one I had. feels lot more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hardisty

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up !
customer_reviews.text: It does the job well and comes with enough hand off points for my emergency strobe, knife and radio.Most important of all to me is it doesn't get in the way of paddling.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and the sizing range is big enough that my younger siblings or friends can use it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Albertson

customer_reviews.title: Great for kayak fishing
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable PFD. I forget I have it on after 30 minutes or so. Paddling and casting is completely unrestricted. I'm 6 ft, 165 lbs and ordered the medium/large. I have it tightened most of the way, but there's room to loosen it if I need to wear a hoodie underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: AdamW83

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and fits me very well. The best thing is the buoyant won't stay between you and the seat when you paddling.
customer_reviews.author: Jay X.

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Plenty of room for adjustment. Very comfortable. Pockets are small.
customer_reviews.author: Kloey Baird

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a good price...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, easily adjusted straps, back doesn't ride up and works well for kayaking, packets are small, but very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable with great fit. I have a 44 inch chest, so right on the line, but I followed the advice of reviewers here and got the medium/large. It's perfect. Looks great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Works great in the kayak.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7 190 the med/large fits great and works great in my kayaks .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 36" waist 44" chest and the med-large fits well. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cesprieto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Good Price. Comfortable. Keeps you afloat. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

product_meta.title: Onyx MoveVent Torsion Kayak/Paddle Life Jacket
product_meta.description: The Onyx Outdoor Movevent Torsion Red Vest provides excellent mobility for kayaking, canoeing, and stand up paddling . This vest fits your body like a glove, yet innovative vented channels help keep you cool during movements. The mesh in the lower back fits high back seats and sit-on-top kayaks. The sculpted and flexible design conforms to you and stays in place. Shoulder adjustments are made with neoprene comfort pads. The vest has adjustable side belt; strong, durable zipper closures; and a zip assist loop at the zipper base to keep the vest in place when you need it.Bubble foam on inner back for added comfortExpandable zippered pockets with mesh drainageDrying loop on back; attached whistle for safetySet includes: vestBrand: Onyx OutdoorModel: 122400-100-040-14Materials: Polyester KnitColor: RedDimensions: 22 inches long x 22 inches wide x 4 inches highModel number: 122400-100-040-14
feature_bullets: Bubble foam on inner back for added comfort
Expandable zippered pockets with mesh drainage
Drying loop on back; attached whistle for safety
400 denier nylon ripstop and 200 denier nylon oxford materials
